import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; const collectData = async (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); var result = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/create', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({tilte, subtilte, description, dateP, dateE}), header: { 'content-Type' : 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json' } }) result = await result.json; localStorage.setItem("Task", JSON.stringify(result)); } export default class Task extends Component{ render() { return (
setTitle(event.target.value)}/>
setSubtitle(event.target.value)} />
